title: Metro Briefing  New York: Manhattan: Bloomberg To Testify
body:
Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg is scheduled to testify tomorrow at a field hearing of the Senate Judiciary Committee 
on immigration reform and whether a national guest-worker program is needed, the committee said yesterday. The 
committee chairman, Senator Arlen Specter of Pennsylvania, will oversee the hearing, to be held at the National 
Constitution Center in Philadelphia. Mr. Bloomberg has called for expansion of the number of work visas and 
permission for new immigrants to gradually attain citizenship.    SEWELL CHAN (NYT)
